option.name: originalContent
option.value:
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8 AS builder ARG SERVICE_NAME=bicis-service WORKDIR /app/$SERVICE_NAME
COPY ./pom.xml /app COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/.mvn ./.mvn COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/mvnw . COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/pom.xml .
RUN ./mvnw clean package -Dmaven.test.skip -Dmaven.main.skip -Dspring-boot.repackage.skip && rm -r ./target/
COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/src ./src
RUN ./mvnw clean package -DskipTests
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8
WORKDIR /app RUN mkdir ./logs ARG SERVICE_NAME=bicis-service ARG TARGET_FOLDER=/app/$SERVICE_NAME/target/ COPY --from=builder $TARGET_FOLDER/bicis-service-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar . ARG PORT_APP=8003 ENV PORT=$PORT_APP EXPOSE $PORT
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "bicis-service-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8 AS builder ARG SERVICE_NAME=bicis-service WORKDIR /app/$SERVICE_NAME
COPY ./pom.xml /app COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/.mvn ./.mvn COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/mvnw . COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/pom.xml .
RUN chmod +x mvnw && sed -i 's/\r$//' mvnw
RUN ./mvnw clean package -Dmaven.test.skip -Dmaven.main.skip -Dspring-boot.repackage.skip && rm -r ./target/
COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/src ./src
RUN ./mvnw clean package -DskipTests
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8
WORKDIR /app RUN mkdir ./logs ARG SERVICE_NAME=bicis-service ARG TARGET_FOLDER=/app/$SERVICE_NAME/target/ COPY --from=builder $TARGET_FOLDER/bicis-service-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar . ARG PORT_APP=8003 ENV PORT=$PORT_APP EXPOSE $PORT
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "bicis-service-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"]

option.value:

COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/src ./src

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8 AS builder ARG SERVICE_NAME=gateway-server WORKDIR /app/$SERVICE_NAME
COPY ./pom.xml /app COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/.mvn ./.mvn COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/mvnw . COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/pom.xml .
RUN ./mvnw clean package -Dmaven.test.skip -Dmaven.main.skip -Dspring-boot.repackage.skip && rm -r ./target/
COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/src ./src
RUN ./mvnw clean package -DskipTests
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8
WORKDIR /app RUN mkdir ./logs ARG SERVICE_NAME=gateway-server ARG TARGET_FOLDER=/app/$SERVICE_NAME/target/ COPY --from=builder $TARGET_FOLDER/gateway-server-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar . ARG PORT_APP=8090 ENV PORT=$PORT_APP EXPOSE $PORT
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "gateway-server-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8 AS builder ARG SERVICE_NAME=gateway-server WORKDIR /app/$SERVICE_NAME
COPY ./pom.xml /app COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/.mvn ./.mvn COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/mvnw . COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/pom.xml .
# Grant execute permission to mvnw and normalize line endings RUN chmod +x mvnw && sed -i 's/\r$//' mvnw
RUN ./mvnw clean package -Dmaven.test.skip -Dmaven.main.skip -Dspring-boot.repackage.skip && rm -r ./target/
COPY ./$SERVICE_NAME/src ./src
RUN ./mvnw clean package -DskipTests
FROM openjdk:26-ea-21-jdk-oraclelinux8
WORKDIR /app RUN mkdir ./logs ARG SERVICE_NAME=gateway-server ARG TARGET_FOLDER=/app/$SERVICE_NAME/target/ COPY --from=builder $TARGET_FOLDER/gateway-server-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar . ARG PORT_APP=8090 ENV PORT=$PORT_APP EXPOSE $PORT
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "gateway-server-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"]
